content.webTitle: How the virus has spread worldwide

fields.headline: How the virus has spread worldwide
fields.bodyText: Total cases worldwide: 2392; deaths: 87 Australia cases: 1; deaths: 0 Belgium cases: 1; deaths: 0 Brazil cases:1; deaths: 0 Canada cases: 69; deaths: 0 China cases: 1220; deaths: 49 Hong Kong cases: 800; deaths: 20 Taiwan cases: 15; deaths: 0 France cases: 3; deaths: 0 Germany cases: 5; deaths: 0 Italy cases: 3; deaths: 0 Ireland cases: 1; deaths: 0 Romania cases: 1; deaths: 0 Singapore cases: 100; deaths: 5 Spain cases: 1; deaths: 0 Switzerland cases: 2; deaths: 0 Thailand cases:7; deaths: 2 UK cases: 3; deaths: 0 United States cases: 100; deaths: 0 Vietnam cases: 59; deaths: 4 · Reported cases from 1 November 2002 to 4 April 2003 collated by World Health Organisation.
